name: Responsive Dashboard
description:
Ever wished the Tumblr Dashboard didn't have the horizontal scrollbar when everything clearly fit on the screen? With Responsive Dashboard, that wish has come true! Features:
  • Hides the horizontal scrollbar unless it's really needed.
  • Slims the margins on many Tumblr pages such as the Dashboard.
  • Makes the Dashboard responsive by automatically hiding the sidebar if the window gets too small for it.
  • Reduces the width of the header to match the Dashboard.
  • Expands the search box to fill the header's available space.
additional_info:
NOTE: This style does not work with my Reduced Width Header or Full Width Header styles. It reduces the header's width to match the Dashboard all on it's own. 10/25/2015:
  • Now keeps the sidebar entirely collapsed even when the window is skinnier than the dashboard.
  • Fixed indentation in the CSS.
8/30/2015:
  • Now remains working when you're reblogging.
7/15/2015:
  • Adds tweaks for other pages within Tumblr (e.g. the inbox, blog activity, search page, etc.).
  • Forces the Search box expand to fill available space on all pages.
6/23/2015:
  • Initial Release.
